title: Goggle pixel 2 keyboard is not there sometimes when I go to use it. I have to restart phone.
content: Goggle Pixel 2XL keyboard is sometimes not there when I go to use it ( it is the Gboard). I have to restart the phone to get it back. This happens several times a day. I downloaded another keyboard ( SwiftKey )hoping this would fix it. Same things happens. Ideas??? Thanks in advance!!
